Class BigBufferedImage

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Image
java.awt.image.BufferedImage
fr.josso.fractales.Core.BigBufferedImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
RenderedImage, WritableRenderedImage, Transparency
public class BigBufferedImage extends BufferedImage
A class to store big image.

  • Constructor Details

    • BigBufferedImage

      private BigBufferedImage(ColorModel cm, BigBufferedImage.SimpleRaster raster, boolean isRasterPremultiplied, Hashtable<?,?> properties)
      a Constructor.
      Parameters:
      cm - ColorModel for the new image.
      raster - Raster for the image data.
      isRasterPremultiplied - if true, the data in the raster has been premultiplied with alpha.
      properties - Hashtable of String/Object pairs.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static BufferedImage create(int width, int height, int imageType)
      a Constructor.
      Parameters:
      width - wanted width of the image.
      height - wanted height if the image.
      imageType - wanted type of the image.
      Returns:
      a BufferedImage or BigBufferedImage depending on the wanted size.

    • createBigBufferedImage

      private static BufferedImage createBigBufferedImage(File tempDir, int width, int height, int imageType) throws IOException
      a Constructor.
      Parameters:
      tempDir - the buffer directory.
      width - wanted width of the image.
      height - wanted height if the image.
      imageType - wanted type of the image.
      Returns:
      a BigBufferedImage of the wanted size.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of unsupported image type.
